title: Insights: Behind early childhood pedagogical documentation
description: This is a book about pedagogical documentation and some of the issues confronted by early childhood professionals. It argues for a way of mapping the learning of young children that is very respectful of children, families and the pedagogical work that is being done in centres.This is for people who want to explore and improve their practice with children; it is not a how to guide but raises questions and possibilities.
author: Alma Fleet
